name: Hạ Long Bay Cruise
summary: Explore the stunning Hạ Long Bay on a luxurious cruise.
description: Embark on a memorable journey through the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Hạ Long Bay. Cruise along emerald waters, visit enchanting caves and islands, and indulge in delicious seafood feasts.

name: Sapa Trekking Adventure
summary: Embark on a challenging trekking adventure in the picturesque landscapes of Sapa.
description: Experience the rugged beauty of Sapa as you trek through terraced rice fields, encounter ethnic minority villages, and enjoy a homestay with local families.

name: Hue Imperial City Tour
summary: Discover the rich history and culture of Hue's Imperial City.
description: Step back in time as you explore the historic landmarks of Hue, including the Imperial City, royal tombs, and Thien Mu Pagoda. Enjoy leisurely strolls along the Perfume River and savor delicious local cuisine.

name: Hoi An Ancient Town Discovery
summary: Explore the charming ancient town of Hoi An.
description: Wander through the picturesque streets of Hoi An and marvel at its well-preserved architecture. Visit historical sites such as the Japanese Covered Bridge and enjoy a cooking class to learn the secrets of Vietnamese cuisine.

name: Phong Nha - Ke Bang National Park Expedition
summary: Discover the breathtaking beauty of Phong Nha - Ke Bang National Park.
description: Embark on an unforgettable adventure through the lush landscapes and spectacular caves of Phong Nha - Ke Bang National Park. Explore fascinating caves, kayak along scenic rivers, and trek through dense jungles.

name: Mui Ne Sand Dunes Adventure
summary: Experience the thrill of exploring the sand dunes of Mui Ne.
description: Embark on an exhilarating adventure through the surreal landscapes of Mui Ne's sand dunes. Slide down towering sand slopes, explore the mystical Fairy Stream, and witness the daily life of local fishermen.

name: Da Lat Countryside Exploration
summary: Discover the tranquil beauty of Da Lat's countryside.
description: Escape to the peaceful countryside of Da Lat and immerse yourself in its natural beauty. Visit vibrant flower farms, serene lakes, and charming French villas. Experience the unique culture of the local ethnic minorities.
